title: Understanding PivotTable Views
text: To change the view of a PivotTable, you need to adjust how the data is grouped or displayed. This can be done by moving fields around in the PivotTable layout.

title: Using the Field List
text: The Field List in a PivotTable allows you to drag and drop fields to different areas such as Rows, Columns, Values, and Filters. This changes how the data is organized and viewed.

hintAnswer: drag the Service Type button across rows to group them by a different grouping
title: Dragging Fields
text: Try dragging the Service Type button across rows to group them by a different grouping. This will change the view of the PivotTable.
choices: drag the Service Type button across rows to group them by a different grouping
